Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.service

Class CardService

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.service.CardService
@Service public class CardService extends Object
Service class for handling operations related to cards.

The CardService class provides methods for managing card entities. This includes operations for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting cards. It interacts with the CardRepository to perform these operations.

The service class is annotated with @Service, marking it as a Spring service component that should be managed by the Spring container.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardService

      public CardService(CardRepository cardRepository)
      Constructs a CardService with the specified CardRepository.

      This constructor initializes the service with the repository needed for performing card-related operations.

      Parameters:
      cardRepository - The repository used to access card data.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public List<Card> getAll()
      Retrieves all cards from the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all cards.

    • getById

      public Optional<Card> getById(Long cardId)
      Retrieves a card by its ID.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the card if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • getByCardNumber

      public Optional<Card> getByCardNumber(String cardId)
      Retrieves a card by its ID.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the card if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • save

      public Card save(Card card)
      Creates a new card in the repository.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to create.
      Returns:
      The created card.

    • update

      public Card update(Long cardId, Card card)
      Updates an existing card in the repository.

      The card with the specified ID will be updated with the information from the provided card object. If the card with the given ID does not exist, the method returns null.

      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card to update.
      card - The card with updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated card, or null if the card with the given ID does not exist.

    • delete

      @Transactional public boolean delete(Long cardId)
      Removes a card by its ID.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the card to remove.
